Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you:

[shadow=red,left]The Prometheus Explorer (Mk1)[/shadow]

Full Gallery Here:

http://imgur.com/a/6g0iy

Description

A rocket-launched, jet-powered atmospheric re-entry craft, the Prometheus Explorer is based off of the past success of the Prometheus Orbiter. Including an increased stability upper stage design, the Explorer is entirely capable of a round trip to Minmus or the Mun with considerable range once in atmosphere in the event of a fudged re-entry.

Highlights


  • [li]Stable, SAS-assisted launch platform[/li]
    [li]Vertical lander stage[/li]
    [li]Stable, SAS-assisted atmospheric flight platform[/li]
    [li]Drag chute for precision landings[/li]
    [li]Emergency separating, impact resistant command module with parachute[/li]

Manufacturer\'s disclaimer: Please raise gear before ignition. Ship only approved and tested for single destination round trips. Your safety is not guaranteed on any attempts to visit more than one celestial body.

____________________________________

Download and take her for a spin! .Craft goes in the VAB folder.

All comments and feedback are appreciated

Have a good flight!

This thing is a death trap.

How so? I personally haven\'t experienced too much instability, if you could describe what went wrong I\'d greatly appreciate it.
I like it. It\'s terrifying. Very Kerbal.
Can we see a pic of the lander on the Mun?

Can we see a pic of the lander on the Mun?

Sure thing, I\'ll make the trip either tonight or tomorrow, pretty late on my end. It\'s definitely capable though, I guarantee it.

Also, forgot to add: on landing, drag chute is ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY. Conventional braking won\'t stop it fast enough before it decides to wobble and break itself apart. Might need a bit of tweaking, but if you pull that drag chute immediately on touchdown you\'ll be fine.
Here y\'go, broken lander legs and all!

Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you:

[shadow=red,left]The Prometheus Explorer (Mk1)[/shadow]

Full Gallery Here:

http://imgur.com/a/6g0iy

>Prometheus

>Kerbal Space Program

>Stock Parts

>Classiness level: Outrageous

Good work son. A grateful nation salutes you in this heroic achievement.
